ApiMcpServerValidateHcl.title: ApiMcpServerValidateHcl
ApiMcpServerValidateHcl.summary: Validates the syntax of HashiCorp Configuration Language (HCL) for Terraform.

GenerateCLICommand.title: GenerateCLICommand
GenerateCLICommand.summary: Generates commands for the Alibaba Cloud command-line interface (CLI).

GetApiDefinition.title: GetApiDefinition
GetApiDefinition.summary: Retrieves the OpenAPI metadata for an API in a product.

GetApiMcpServer.title: GetApiMcpServer
GetApiMcpServer.summary: Retrieves the details of a specific API MCP service.

GetApiMcpServerUserConfig.title: GetApiMcpServerUserConfig
GetApiMcpServerUserConfig.summary: Queries the global API MCP Server configuration for a user. The configuration includes settings for public network access and the whitelist of source VPC IDs for requests from a VPC.

GetErrorCodeSolutions.title: Queries an error solution by error code
GetErrorCodeSolutions.summary: Queries an error solution by error code.

GetOwnRequestLog.title: GetOwnRequestLog
GetOwnRequestLog.summary: Queries the details of an OpenAPI call log for your account using the request ID returned from an API call. This operation is used for troubleshooting.

GetProductEndpoints.title: GetProductEndpoints
GetProductEndpoints.summary: Retrieves the endpoint information for a product.

GetRequestLog.title: GetRequestLog
GetRequestLog.summary: Queries the details of a request log using the request ID that is returned from an API call. This operation is useful for troubleshooting.

ListApiDefinitions.title: ListApiDefinitions
ListApiDefinitions.summary: Retrieves the OpenAPI metadata for a product.

ListApiMcpServerSystemTools.title: ListApiMcpServerSystemTools
ListApiMcpServerSystemTools.summary: Lists the system tools supported by the MCP service.

ListApiMcpServers.title: ListApiMcpServers
ListApiMcpServers.summary: This operation queries a list of all API MCP servers in an Alibaba Cloud account.

UpdateApiMcpServerUserConfig.title: UpdateApiMcpServerUserConfig
UpdateApiMcpServerUserConfig.summary: Updates the global API MCP Server configuration for a user.
